metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4700 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2018-4300.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2018-4300. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2018-4300 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4700` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
cups-bsd - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
cups-client - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
cups-common - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
cups-core-drivers - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
cups-daemon - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
cups-ipp-utils - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
cups-ppdc - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
cups-server-common - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
libcups2 - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
libcupscgi1 - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
libcupsimage2 - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
libcupsmime1 - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
libcupsppdc1 - 2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.7-1ubuntu2.2').
